name: Sanguine Sacrilege
description:
Sanguine Sacrilege is an isometric action roguelike, heavily inspired by games like Hades and Curse of the dead gods. 

Take on the mantle of a religious warrior, tasked with retrieving a holy relic from a heathen temple. Delve deep and kill anything in your path, all in the hopes that you will succeed before you lose faith.

The game was made as part of a 9 week project by 10 students at the University of Skövde.
